name: Yellowlink
overview: Yellowlink The Mobile Solutions Company Yellowlink helps businesses redefine the way they connect to their customers across every mobile channel through innovative applications. We are a leading mobile app development firm. We were born on a philosophy of pioneering the future of mobile app development and interaction. We envisioned the future of technology and marketing, and saw the enormous potential in the quickly evolving mobile application market and sought out the best mobile app platform imaginable. Yellowlink’s platform provides multi-channel solutions for different industries such as Hospitality, Retail, Events and Entertainment. We deliver mission-critical tools in fields as mobile payments, mobile marketing and Enterprise. With state-of-the-art technology, we create experiences that are both functional and business driven. We continuously improve our platform, to the benefit of our customers. Among our partners, we provide the tools that help create revenue streams from time and cost effective mobile strategies. We work with our customers throughout the creation and marketing processes to design personalized, proven interactive solutions. Our multi-disciplinary team has created more than 300 applications and combines innovation, professionalism, and efficiency to deliver world-class products and solutions. Yellowlink is a well-acknowledged Mexican company, with a solid customer base and full market- understanding. We deliver sales and profitable margins that help our partners expand quickly and smoothly. As of 2012, we have expanded our client-base to over 15 countries.
